Text: Is this the business edition? My hot key combo won't launch it

THIS DOES NOT WORK.
Opens fine, no trial pop up, but you can not start/stop monitoring.
how do you run the crack?

@Aypolo

You have to install the monitor tracker (which is included) first.

When you have the Refog window open, click on the upper left logo (which says 'Monitor') and choose install.

Monitor tracking will work in no time.

Works perfectly for me. Appreciate the upload.

Regards.

Great so far! 
Whats with the update? No go or can do? I'll assume NO until otherwise advised. 
THANK YOU!
